welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Noisiel, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historical sites, and delicious French cuisine. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and discover all that Noisiel has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Consists of seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and some airlines serving North Africa.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed Wi-Fi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering VIP services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
